note:
We design, manufacture and market physical information security products for the non-technical consumer.

These physical products — designed for wide distribution — are fun, colorful, creative, engaging and interesting.

The move to Mastodon is an awesome opportunity to create something new, something fresh — a community of like-minded individuals with a diversity of opinion (not a contradiction).

Would you consider following me here on Mastodon? I’m committed to nurturing your Home feed with a healthy dose of unusual, insightful, sometimes humorous, and (hopefully) useful information security content — honest conversation without rancor or drama.

I also post daily Welcome Videos, Quote of the Day, and Signs of the Times. All with consistent hashtags, so folks can search and find them if they like them, or filter them out of their feed if they don't.

It would be awesome to build this new community together with you!
